name: A. Square
statement:
A square of positive (strictly greater than 0) area is located on the
coordinate plane, with sides parallel to the coordinate axes. You are
given the coordinates of its corners, in random order. Your task is to
find the area of the square.
editorial:
There are many ways to solve this problem, the simplest way is as
follows. Letâs find the minimum and maximum coordinate among all the
corners of the square. The difference of these coordinates will give us
the length of the square side . After that, we can calculate the area of
the square as .
